doc:
David Peel (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Peel_(actor) 0 David Peel (19 June 1920 – 4 September 1981) was an English film and television actor.He was born in London on 19 June 1920. He attended the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art and was a minor player in a few films. In 1960, he was cast in the starring role of Baron Meinster in Hammer Film Productions’ The Brides of Dracula. He retired from the film industry following this film and became an estate agent and antiques dealer. He died in London on 4 September 1981 aged 61. David_Peel ( 19_June_1920 – 4_September_1981 ) was an_English_film_and_television_actor.He was_born in London on 19_June_1920 . He attended the_Royal_Academy of Dramatic_Art and was a_minor_player in a_few_films . In 1960 , he was_cast in the_starring_role of Baron_Meinster in Hammer_Film_Productions ’_The_Brides of Dracula . He retired from the_film_industry following this_film and became an_estate_agent_and_antiques_dealer . He died in London on 4_September_1981_aged_61 .
